gp-global-section-510810854082479042.ggbZ5DRr9eN_text_html: Subscribe to receive offers, information on new products and much more
gp-global-section-510810854082479042.ggk2fOnuo6U_errorMessage_html: Can't send email. Please try again later.
gp-global-section-510810854082479042.ggoKuJ2_SLC_text_html: By subscribing to our newsletter you accept our privacy policy and will receive commercial communications

gp-global-section-510898589761799374.gggL_-hkKAp_text_html: Welcome to Pura Vida , the epicenter of false eyelash innovation. We are a Spanish company, founded by a team of young professionals who share a common passion: enhancing the beauty of each person with superior quality products.
gp-global-section-510898589761799374.gg97_fTghKe_text_html: Pura Vida is more than a brand; it is a promise of beauty, quality and care. We are dedicated to exceeding your expectations, offering you not just lashes, but a complete experience that will have you coming back again and again.

gp-global-section-509366754225423463.gb5ut-pF3Ll_text_html: Excellence can only be created with these three principles
gp-global-section-509366754225423463.gClf6X3nKxw_text_html: We work with the best professionals in the sector, to give our clients the best possible quality.
gp-global-section-509366754225423463.gmfFbqlv9P-_text_html: Customers are our priority, that's why we give personalized attention to each one of them.
gp-global-section-509366754225423463.gIvCNv7DVIO_text_html:
Our shipments are fast, forget about buying outside of Spain

2-3 days

gp-global-section-509366809573458847.gg8Rit80lSL_childItem_0_html: How can I place an order for out of stock products?
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggC2PgZ0_Y9_text_html:
Out of stock orders: Customers can purchase products that appear as out of stock on the website.

*These require a minimum purchase amount and are managed directly with our suppliers.

How to Request an Exclusive Order:

Contact: Start the process through the chat on our website or by sending an email to info@puravidalash.com.
Required Information: Please provide your full name, email and details of the desired item.
Confirmation: After receiving your request, we will contact you to confirm and proceed with the order.
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggp1KWHtQJm_childItem_0_html: How can I order products that are not on the website?
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggHXW2Yikmo_text_html:
For items not listed on our website:

Contact us about the item you are looking for,

*These require a minimum purchase amount and are managed directly with our suppliers.

How to Request an Exclusive Order:

Contact: Start the process through the chat on our website or by sending an email to info@puravidalash.com.
Required Information: Please provide your full name, email and details of the desired item.
Confirmation: After receiving your request, we will contact you to confirm and proceed with the order.
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggTNOTdBPEn_childItem_0_html: Which delivery companies do you work with for shipping?
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggTNOTdBPEn_childItem_2_html: How long does it take to process an order?
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggfJ7JjIlY3_text_html: We work with the best delivery companies to ensure that your order arrives safely and efficiently to your door.
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggloheJ3yQN_text_html: Once your order has been processed, shipping time is usually 1-3 business days. We work hard to ensure your order arrives as quickly as possible.
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggzZE0RVdhl_text_html:
Processing time varies depending on whether the product is in stock or pre-order:

For in-stock products: processing time is 1-3 business days.
For products out of stock or not listed on the website: the processing time is very variable, it depends on the total amount of the order and other factors.
Contact us for more information through our chat or by email info@puravidalash.com.
gp-global-section-509366809573458847.ggzdpnuG1z8_text_html:
Standard Orders: Customers can purchase products directly when they are available in inventory.

Out of stock orders: Customers can purchase products that appear as out of stock on the website.

*These require a minimum purchase amount and are managed directly with our suppliers.

For items not listed on our website:

Contact us about the item you are looking for,

*These require a minimum purchase amount and are managed directly with our suppliers.

Contact us for more information through our chat or by email info@puravidalash.com.

gp-global-section-526148397497844851.gg8EQ_cUY13_errorMessage_html: Can't send email. Please try again later.

gp-global-section-526252328592868252.ggyQuvl18B6_text_html: Don't miss our launch and get exclusive discounts
gp-global-section-526252328592868252.ggpda9C9DNh_successMessage_html: We will let you know when the website is available.

gp-global-section-541231622796608624.ggHq4tg6cuB_text_html:
At Puravida Lash , we transform every look into art. With years of experience and a passion for perfection, we offer eyelash extensions, adhesives and treatments designed to enhance natural beauty with quality and professionalism.

Discover innovative products on our website, created to guarantee impeccable results and bring out the best in you. Puravida Lash : where the magic of an unforgettable look begins
gp-global-section-541231622796608624.ggO29Kr8IQR_text_html:
Puravida Lash YY lashes are a masterpiece of innovation. Designed to achieve a perfect balance between volume and subtlety, these lashes offer a unique effect that combines naturalness and elegance. Their special "Y" shape creates a fuller and more defined look, ideal for both everyday looks and special occasions.

We have spent time developing a product that is not only easy to apply, but also guarantees customer comfort and long-lasting results. Each lash has been subjected to rigorous testing to ensure its strength, lightness and adaptability to the needs of professionals. With YY lashes, we enhance every look with a professional finish that speaks of quality, precision and style.
gp-global-section-541231622796608624.gg5RZrX32Qm_text_html: Premade Fans : Perfection in every detail
gp-global-section-541231622796608624.ggL3VN4wtcv_text_html:
At Puravida Lash , Premade Fans are the result of years of dedication, research and continuous improvement. Each pre-formed fan has been designed to offer professional results without compromising naturalness or comfort. We know that time is of the essence for professionals, which is why our Premade Fans allow for fast and effective applications without sacrificing quality.

With perfect symmetry and a lightweight design, these lashes offer impeccable volume that enhances every look. Rigorously tested and crafted from the highest quality materials, Premade Fans are ideal for those seeking a stunning, refined and long-lasting finish. At Puravida Lash , we understand that eye gazing is an art, and each premade fan reflects our commitment to excellence.
gp-global-section-541231622796608624.ggBON8BQkQT_text_html: Korean quality in a national brand
gp-global-section-541231622796608624.ggCXEB7E8Sq_text_html: At Puravida Lash , we unite the best of two worlds: Korean quality , recognized for its precision and durability in the world of eyelashes, with the essence of a proudly Spanish brand.

gp-global-section-541814783238734713.ggZ9_dh1Jjp_text_html: Our Puravida Lash brand is on its way and we want you to be a part of this exciting beginning. With your support, we will be able to grow faster and offer you more high-quality products designed to enhance beauty.
